title: Yew Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Upscale restaurant has a separate vegan menu for both lunch and dinner, including things like truffle mac and cheese made with daiya cheese, saffron risotto, tacos, coconut pana cotta and more. Located in the Four Seasons Hotel. Please ask if vegan menu is available for brunch.
